jam.sort.stream
Class YaleOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.OutputStream
        |
        +--jam.sort.stream.EventOutputStream
              |
              +--jam.sort.stream.YaleOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
L002Parameters
public class YaleOutputStream
extends EventOutputStream
implements L002Parameters

This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format. It extends EventOutputStream, adding methods for reading events and returning them as int arrays which the sorter can handle.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Dale Visser, Ken Swartz
See Also:
EventOutputStream
